meanings.definition: To make aesthetic or visually pleasing.
meanings.sent1: She estheticized the room by adding colorful paintings.
meanings.sent2: The artist estheticized the plain wall with a beautiful mural.
meanings.sent3: The cat estheticized its bed by arranging its toys neatly around it.
meanings.sent4: The garden was estheticized by the blooming flowers, creating a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent5: The sunset estheticized the sky with vibrant hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: To give an artistic quality to something.
meanings.sent1: He estheticized his music by incorporating unique instruments.
meanings.sent2: The designer estheticized the dress with intricate embroidery.
meanings.sent3: The chef estheticized the dish by arranging the food in a creative pattern.
meanings.sent4: Her dance performance estheticized the stage with graceful movements.
meanings.sent5: The photographer estheticized the landscape with skillful composition.
